home.heroParagraph: I am a Full Stack Developer specializing in high-performance web applications. I bridge the gap between complex backend logic and sleek frontend experiences.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: A collection of projects showcasing my journey in building scalable web applications, tackling complex backend challenges, and crafting intuitive user interfaces.
projects.nexusAnalyticsDesc: A comprehensive sales dashboard built for enterprise clients. Features real-time data visualization, user role management, and automated reporting systems.
projects.swiftpayMobileDesc: A cross-platform fintech application focusing on peer-to-peer payments. Implements biometric authentication and secure WebSocket connections for instant transactions.
projects.coreApiServiceDesc: High-performance microservices architecture handling over 10k req/s. Includes custom load balancing, Redis caching layers, and comprehensive documentation.
projects.sentientNlpDesc: A natural language processing toolkit designed for sentiment analysis on social media streams. Integrates with Twitter API v2.
projects.atomCmsDesc: A headless CMS built for speed and flexibility. Offers a customizable block editor and instantaneous GraphQL content delivery.
projects.comingSoonDesc: Currently working on a Web3 marketplace. Stay tuned for updates.

experience.title: Experience & Skills
experience.subtitle: My professional journey through software engineering and the technical arsenal I've built along the way.
experience.techFlowDesc1: Design and development of a workflow management application (BPMN 2.0).
experience.techFlowDesc2: Writing tests, validation of functional milestones and corrective maintenance during the pilot phase.
experience.creativePulseDesc1: Design and development of a no-code application with Retool.
experience.creativePulseDesc2: Database design and management with Supabase.
experience.startupDesc: Schedule and team management. Tracking interventions and client relations.

contact.title: Let's Build Something
contact.subtitle: Whether you have a question, a project idea, or just want to say hi, I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and challenges.
contact.downloadCVDesc: Download my CV to see a detailed overview of my technical skills, experience, and education.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your project, timeline, and budget...
contact.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.
